Repentant stony shipper.  Ironstrange and supremefamily content. Main blog @lucifers-favorite-child. Posts tagged #incorrect-ironstrange. Icon from @hello-shellhead. 
I write on AO3 as lucifersfavoritechild .
Throw money at me: http://ko-fi.com/V7V6IXJK.
Long live the irondick!

I guess this is a Peter and Stephen stan blog now.

Tony: It doesn't make sense. How could anyone hate Stephen?
Rhodey: I don't know man, maybe they've met him?
body:
Tony: It doesn't make sense. How could anyone hate Stephen?
Rhodey: I don't know man, maybe they've met him?

summary: HEY GUYS, THIS IS A BIG OLD REMINDER I HAVE A TWITTER Since I seem to be getting more followers, you should all know I have a...
caption:
HEY GUYS, THIS IS A BIG OLD REMINDER I HAVE A TWITTER

Since I seem to be getting more followers, you should all know I have a twitter where I post lots of WIP’s, things that don’t fit here and rambles. Heck I have two!

If you want just the art, look here 

And if you want to hear my nattering, go here!

There you go! If you want to see more scribbles from me on the regular, go check them out!

summary:
Dear FBI Agent monitoring my internet activity, 
I am not planning on blowing anything up. I’m writing about Tony Stark.

I am not planning on blowing anything up. I’m writing about Tony Stark.

tags: this is getting long so I'll just leave it as the OG Avengers
summary: I'd like to ask for your headcanons about Marvel characters (mostly Steve and Peggy) in HP universe? Not only your ideas for...
question: I'd like to ask for your headcanons about Marvel characters (mostly Steve and Peggy) in HP universe? Not only your ideas for which house they'd belong to, but how do you see their adult careers?
answer:
Ooooh, interesting. I wouldn’t call these hard and fast headcanons, especially regarding houses as there is so much overlap, but what I tend to lean towards:

Steve as a Hufflepuff. The traits that I associate the most with Steve as a highly developed sense of justice, of what’s right and wrong, and what’s fair, and being willing to work hard and keep persevering in order to get where he wants to go, as well as his being a very loyal person and valuing loyalty. I think there’s a strong argument for placing him in Gryffindor, but looking both at his traits and his values, for me he leans more into the Puff side. 

Alternatively, if we’re talking Steve attending Ilvermorny rather than Hogwarts then I think, based on what little we know about those houses, that he would be a Thunderbird (representing the ‘soul’). 

I do think he would be likely to end up an Auror, but I think he would be a very troublesome one who is constantly only just toeing the line if not crossing right over it, preferring to follow his own morality than adhering unquestioningly to the rules - I imagine he’d be hauled up for warnings and official reprimands, going out in the field when he’s technically on probation and meant to be a behind a desk, all around a complete thorn in his superiors’ sides, but they can’t just get rid of him because he usually turns out to be right and because they know the team of Aurors he leads would riot if he was fired.

Peggy, on the other hand, I think is absolutely a Gryffindor, although one with some very Slytherin behaviours. From a young age she’s valued ideas of chivalry and daring, and I see her as someone who values courage and determination in other people - and I think she’s also more interested in what’s right and less interested in what’s fair, if that make sense, where I see Steve wanting both. 

Post Hogwarts, I think she would also join the Department of Magical Law Enforcement, but I think she would climb the ladder rather than staying in the field and eventually end up as Department Head - I think she would also frequently clash with Steve when he breaks the rules, or at least appear to since really she also bends the rules a lot herself to help him and is a good part of the reason why he’s never actually been fired. 

Other characters I have more defined ideas for are:

Bruce - Ravenclaw. He’s a scholar at heart, wanting to learn and accumulate knowledge and use that to understand the world around him, but he’s also an innovative and creative thinker. I see him as going to work as an Unspeakable in the Department of Mysteries, researching things no one else quite understands - and its his work there that culminates in an accident that leaves him with this peculiar, and dangerous, shape-shifting condition that he cannot fully control.

Tony - Slytherin. As intelligent as Tony is, he’s not that interested in knowledge for knowledge’s sake, but more for how he can use it to benefit himself (and, later, others). He’s also a very ambitious person, and willing to pursue that no matter the odds. I don’t know that he would go down a traditional career path as such, but would create several new spells and potions, perhaps refine wand-making techniques, perhaps even find ways of integrating muggle technology with magic.

Natasha - Slytherin. Natasha may not be ambitious, as such, but she is clever, cunning and has learned to adapt and do whatever she needs to do to survive. I can see her as a metamorphmagus, and a mistress of potions and spells that she can use to enhance her natural ability to disguise herself, all of which makes her a very valuable asset to the special Auror branch she works for that involves many undercover missions.

Clint - Hufflepuff. He’s not one for flashy displays of daring or particularly values that idealistic sort of courage in others, but he does care about fairness and doing the right thing, and giving people second chances. He’s determined, and loyal and he will see things through to the end. Career wise I can actually see him starting out as a Curse Breaker, often working closely with the Ministry. (When he was at Hogwarts he was a Seeker on the Quidditch Team, and got nicknamed Hawkeye for his unerring ability to spot the Snitch even at the far end of the pitch. To no one’s surprise when he learned to cast a Patronus, it was a hawk.)

Thor - Gryffindor. The most Gryffindor, he prides himself on being brave and daring, is a bit hotheaded and tends to jump into things without thinking them through, but at heart he wants nothing more than to be a good person and to do right. And he values that same sense of goodness and bravery in others. Honestly, I think he would be a big ol’ jock and end up going into professional Quidditch, ending up a star Chaser and Captain.

blog.name: zajelimilogin
blog.title: Dream a little bigger, darling.
blog.description:
Woman.
Determined.
Braided.

What else?
Normality is overrated.
Wibbly wobbly, timey wimey.
Black, two sugars. I'll be upstairs.
One more miracle, please.

You mustn't be afraid to dream a little bigger, darling.

summary: still not enough Inktober 2018 Day 7: exhausted
caption:
still not enough

Inktober 2018
Day 7: exhausted

blog.name: otp-ideas-human
blog.title: i like chocolate milk
blog.description: just a mess of what im into at the time :) the names cheese. feel free to browse, but try not to carouse, ho ho!

summary: marvel as things i've said at least once
body:
marvel as things i’ve said at least once

Bruce: Geometry literally gives me heartburn

Thor: I’m stronk enough for this. I carried myself through freshman year and let me tell you that felt like bench-pressing an elephant’s dick

Tony: I’ll fuck your mom for you

Steve: See if I ever give you head again

Parker: I hungy

Clint: I’m so sick of your shit I’m already throwing up

Sam: Yeah can I get uh large frie and a kerbipple beesechurger

Nat: I literally have no idea what I’m doing at any given moment and yet I still succeed. I’m just that good

Scott: Dude I’m your biggest fan, can I have a CD

T'Challa: I’m in pain. A lot. And I need a bandaid right now

Quill: Young man, there’s no need to be down, I said young man, please don’t poop on the ground

Draxx: The first word that ever came out of my mouth was “fuck” followed by a long stream of projectile vomit

Rocket: I’m a wild animal, and you think I can read? Tragic

Stephen: Big trucks that use the third lane like they’re supposed to give me a major boner

Everett: I’m having a crisis

Wanda: You ever just wake up from a nap and wonder where the fuck you are because I don’t know any of you where am I

Thanos: I’m big, bitch

Loki: Not my fault like you drive a (insert car brand and model)

Wade: Fuck me with a pogostick, fuck

BONUS:

Nick: How the shit do you expect me to know what’s going on around me if I literally have no sense of peripheral vision

blog.name: zajelimilogin
blog.title: Dream a little bigger, darling.
blog.description:
Woman.
Determined.
Braided.

What else?
Normality is overrated.
Wibbly wobbly, timey wimey.
Black, two sugars. I'll be upstairs.
One more miracle, please.

You mustn't be afraid to dream a little bigger, darling.

blog.description: HIATUS/INACTIVE. a salty chompy mofo bitch. Marvel & sometimes other stuff | Spoilers | Hate-free (but there will be criticism) | Meta, gifs, art, everything goes. There will be multishipping. Header by @anthonyed

tags: i've been meaning to make this for a while
it's based on my meta that tony is the king in this game of chess
summary: “The Mind Stone is the fourth of the Infinity Stones to show up in the last few years. That’s not a coincidence. Someone has...
caption:
“The Mind Stone is the fourth of the Infinity Stones to show up in the last few years. That’s not a coincidence. Someone has been playing an intricate game and has made pawns of us.”
    – Thor (Avengers: Age of Ultron)

“Endgame” is a term used to label the late stage of a chess game when there’s fewer pieces on the board–and the King becomes a more powerful figure. This is why Strange saved Tony–not only because Tony will be a pivotal figure moving forward, but to lose Tony would be checkmate. (x)

summary: while hanging out with tony one day peter absent-mindedly says “I want to go to disney world” . . . except all tony hears is “I...
body: while hanging out with tony one day peter absent-mindedly says “I want to go to disney world” … except all tony hears is “I want disney world” so flashforward to two hours later to pepper trying to talk tony out of buying a multi-billion dollar theme park

title: Take What You Need
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2PiVYkP

by debwalsh

Following the events of The Winter Soldier, Steve finally releases himself from care and goes on the hunt for Bucky. When he finds him, the two old friends embark on a voyage of rediscovery.

summary: Revival (the spark of fire burning bright)
title: Revival (the spark of fire burning bright)
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2CvWIjK

by Stargirltakingflight

While the world turns and rebuilds, Tony Stark lights a fire in the heart of the universe, and tells the world about the ones who will protect it, help it, the ones who will avenge it.

He also travels back to earth in an almost broken spaceship with a blue android. Stranger things have happened.

Words: 579, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

Series: Part 1 of Of a Universe half-killed (but living)

  • Fandoms: Marvel Cinematic Universe, The Avengers (Marvel Movies), Iron Man (Movies)
  • Rating: General Audiences
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: Gen
  • Characters: Tony Stark, Nebula (Marvel)
